review.title: “For people who don't mind traveling and have a mind for IT and Maths”
review.pros: Pros – No significant amount of internal politics, intelligent colleagues great opportunities for further study (MBA, CFA or Financial Mathematics in Oxford, all fully paid), good salary growth, flat hierarchies, not much bureaucracy because the company is not too large
review.cons: Cons – You are away from home Monday to Friday
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Show some more enthusiasm when presenting at company functions, streamline processes to make dealing with travel costs easier for consultants.

review.title: “IT”
review.pros: Pros – Rapid salary growth, additional stydies like part-time MSc programme possible
review.cons: Cons – Mostly IT work, coding to interfaces. Making other's people broken anything work.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Promote people besed on their performance and not the ability of certain managers to push their favorites.
